name: ConceptDraw MINDMAP Document
summary: A CDMZ file is a mind-mapping document created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw MINDMAP, a program that captures ideas with mind maps. It contains a diagram comprised of text, connecting relationship lines, objects, images, shapes, and symbols. ConceptDraw MINDMAP users create CDMZ files to save various types of mind maps, such as brainstorming sessions and flowcharts.
